title: 2 Capitol riot defendants sought by FBI after disappearing
description: The FBI is searching for a Florida woman who was supposed to stand trial Monday on charges stemming from the Jan. 6, 2021, Capitol attack as well as another riot defendant who has also gone missing

title: Boston's Justin Turner hit in face by pitch, leaves game
description: Boston Red Sox infielder Justin Turner was taken to a hospital after leaving a game against the Detroit Tigers when he was hit in the face with a pitch

title: Passenger allegedly tries to stab flight attendant, open emergency door
description: A passenger has been arrested after he allegedly tried to open an emergency exit door on a United Airlines flight.

title: Mom dies after tree falls on her during Boy Scout hike
description: A mom died after a tree fell on her while she was hiking with Boy Scouts in California this weekend, according to officials.

title: Florida bill would force bloggers to register with state
description: A Republican lawmaker in Florida wants bloggers who write about elected officials to register with the state

title: 'Boy Meet World' star Ben Savage is running for Congress to succeed Rep. Adam Schiff
description: Former "Boy Meets World" star Ben Savage is running for Congress in California's 30th Congressional District

title: Twitter glitches as links, images fail to load
description: Twitter experienced a bevy of glitches as links stopped working, some users were unable to log in and Tweetdeck stopped working for others

title: No one hurt when 2 United flights touch at Boston airport
description: Two flights scheduled to depart from Boston Logan International Airport made contact with each other near the gate area

title: China criticizes call to improve basic human rights
description: A U.N.-backed panel is calling on China to improve basic human rights.

title: WATCH:  Dog has epic quinceañera
description: Little Bit turned 15 and had an epic party with all kinds of treats -- and even a Selena impersonator.

title: Made in the USA? Proposed rule clarifies grocery meat labels
description: Federal agriculture officials are proposing a new rule that would clarify the meaning of meat labels that say foods are “Made in the USA.”

title: 'Hamilton' fundraiser set for Hispanic Federation, Flamboyan
description: “Hamilton” creator Lin-Manuel Miranda will bring his award-winning musical back to Puerto Rico for two weeks of performances in June, including a fundraiser for the Hispanic Federation and education nonprofit, the Flamboyan Foundation

title: Soccer player in Ivory Coast dies after collapsing on field
description: A soccer player in Ivory Coast has died after collapsing on the field during a league game

title: Thousands of pro-Trump bots are attacking DeSantis, Haley
description: The tens of thousands of fake Twitter accounts created to support Donald Trump.

title: Al-Qaida says 2 operatives killed in drone strike in Yemen
description: Al-Qaida's arm in the Arabian Peninsula says two of its operatives were killed by a drone strike in central Yemen

title: Archaeologists in Egypt unearth Sphinx-like Roman-era statue
description: Authorities say archaeologists have unearthed a Sphinx-like Roman-era statue and the remains of a shrine in an ancient temple in southern Egypt

title: European police, FBI bust international cybercrime gang
description: German police say they have disrupted an international cybercrime gang which has been blackmailing large companies and institutions for years

title: Florida flight returns to Cuba after birds cause engine fire
description: A flight to Florida from Cuba was forced to turn back after it struck birds that caused an engine to catch fire and fill the cabin with smoke

title: Hard-hit California braces for another round of snow
description: In hard-hit California, the Sierra Nevada mountains are continuing to get slammed with snow and is now just a few inches away from breaking a new record.

title: Altria makes $2.75B investment in e-cigarette startup NJOY
description: Days after exiting its stake in troubled electronic cigarette maker Juul Labs, Altria announced a $2.75 billion investment in electronic cigarette startup NJOY Holdings Inc. As part of the deal, tobacco company Altria Group Inc., which makes Marlboro c...

title: WATCH:  Driver braves towering walls of snow
description: A California resident drove between two huge walls of snow to get to their property near Lake Tahoe.

title: Dozens arrested in fiery clashes at site of Atlanta's 'Cop City' training center
description: The Atlanta Public Safety Training Center, known by its opponents as "Cop City," has been at the center of escalating demonstrations and confrontations.

title: Fears of gunshots prompt deadly trampling at Rochester concert, police say
description: Eight people were trampled at a Rochester, NY concert Sunday, leaving one dead, two with critical “life-threatening” injuries, and six others with injuries.

title: 3 dead in Illinois home invasion, police say
description: Two adults and a juvenile were killed in a home invasion on Sunday in Illinois, police said. Bolingbrook Police said they responded at 8:15 p.m.

title: Iran's top leader says suspected poisonings 'unforgivable'
description: Iran’s supreme leader says that if a series of suspected poisonings at girls’ schools are proven to be deliberate, the culprits should be sentenced to death for committing an “unforgivable crime.”

title: Trailblazing transgender lawmaker Georgina Beyer dies at 65
description: Georgina Beyer, a trailblazing New Zealand politician who in 1999 became the world’s first openly transgender member of Parliament, has died

title: Asian stocks gain after Wall Street has best day in 6 weeks
description: Shares are mostly higher in Asia after strong data on the U.S. economy sent Wall Street to its best close in six weeks

title: FBI searching for 4 US citizens kidnapped in Mexico, embassy says
description: The FBI is searching for four U.S. citizens who have been kidnapped in Mexico, the U.S. Embassy in Mexico City said.

title: Manafort, US government settle civil case for $3.15 million
description: The former chairman of Trump’s 2016 presidential campaign settled a civil case.

title: Ron DeSantis visits Southern California 1 year away from Super Tuesday
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis visited Southern California on Sunday, taking swipes at Gov. Gavin Newsom in his own backyard.

title: China Premier Li Keqiang bows out as Xi loyalists take reins
description: It's a move from technocrats who helped steer the world's second-biggest economy

title: 10 million Americans under winter alerts as snow slams West Coast mountains
description: Millions of people are under winter weather alerts in the western U.S. as snow continues to hit the region.

title: Exxon Mobil sued as 5 nooses displayed at Louisiana facility
description: U.S. government says Exxon Mobil violated law failing to take sufficient action.
